pre_caption: This hand-drawn animation is presented in a medium shot, consistently showing a woman from the waist up. She is positioned in the center of the frame against a plain white background. Throughout the animation, as her attire and appearance transform, her body remains centrally located. The primary movement within the frame occurs when she fans out a piece of her clothing, which expands from her central position toward the left side of the screen.
